name: Glowos
description: Glowos (global warming's post scriptum) is a story about survival in the new world that remains after global warming and a chain of catastrophes ravaged the earth. The player takes control of Helios, the sun energy rider, as she tries to survive her coming of age ritual. The game has a focus on collecting sun energy and surviving as long as possible, with gaining score as an additional task. The intended audience for the game is children between 10-12 years old.
